hero.title: TUMER GROUP TRAVEL AGENCY
hero.subtitle: A comfortable, safe, and stylish car rental experience

whyChooseUs.offerOptions: We offer a wide range of vehicles to suit every need.
whyChooseUs.profSupport: We provide professional support based on transparency and trust in all processes.
whyChooseUs.afforPrice: We offer quality service at the most affordable prices.

tours.inİstanbul: Have an unforgettable experience with comfortable and guided city tours in Istanbul.
tours.outOfTour: Daily or overnight trips to different cities in Türkiye with our comfortable vehicles.

cityTour.title: City Tour
cityTour.subtitle: Discover every corner of Istanbul with us!
cityTour.aboutText: With our city tour service, you can reach all historical, cultural, and modern spots in Istanbul accompanied by our professional drivers. Whether it's shopping or a historical trip... The route is tailored for you!

highlights.durationText: You can start and end at your desired times.
highlights.routeText: Freedom to go anywhere within Istanbul.
highlights.driverText: Our experienced drivers will accompany you.

outOfTownTour.title: Out of Town Tour
outOfTownTour.subtitle: Discover every corner of Turkey with us!
outOfTownTour.aboutText: With our out-of-town tour service, you can reach all historical, cultural, and modern destinations in Turkey accompanied by our professional drivers. Whether it's Trabzon or Sapanca… the route is up to you!

highlights.durationText: You can start and end at your desired times.
highlights.routeText: Freedom to go anywhere in Turkey.
highlights.driverText: Our experienced drivers will accompany you.

about.title: ABOUT US
content: Our company started its professional journey over 20 years ago, with TÜMER DIŞ TİCARET in 1995, focusing on foreign trade and men's clothing.
Due to the evolving sector and emerging needs, in 2003 we expanded our professional team and added INVITE (Doğan Tekstil) to our group.
With our growing team, strong infrastructure, experience, and international connections, we added Real Estate and Tourism companies in 2013, uniting all under TÜMER GROUP.

TÜMER GROUP and its companies have established long-term, trust-based business relationships with Saudi Arabia, Yemen, Kuwait, UAE, Qatar, and other Middle Eastern countries, contributing greatly to the national economy.
TÜMER GROUP continues to grow with innovation and professionalism, maintaining customer satisfaction and honesty as core values, always staying ahead in the sector.
about.author: MUHİTTİN UÇAR
about.titlePosition: Chairman of the Board, TÜMER GROUP

export.title: EXPORT:
export.description: We provide textile export and consultancy services to existing and potential customers in Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar, U.A.E, and other Middle Eastern countries.

textile.title: TEXTILE PRODUCTION:
textile.description: Since 2003, we have been producing shirts and t-shirts with high quality, innovative and unique designs in the men's fashion sector.

realEstate.title: REAL ESTATE PURCHASE AND SALE:
realEstate.description: Using our experience and network in foreign trade and textiles, we offer real estate purchase and sale services for our foreign clients.

tourism.title: TOURISM:
tourism.description: We provide airport transfer, hotel reservation, car rental, city tours, and guidance services to our clients and their guests.
